Utils para descargar archivos

{% raw %}

download_file[source]

download_file(directory:Union[str, Path], source_url:str, decompress:bool=False)

Download data from source_ulr inside directory.

Parameters

directory: str, Path Custom directory where data will be downloaded. source_url: str URL where data is hosted. decompress: bool Wheter decompress downloaded file. Default False.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Todos los datasets se heredarían de esta dataclass que tiene los atributos que queremos

{% raw %}

class TimeSeriesDataset[source]

TimeSeriesDataset(S:ndarray, X:ndarray, Y:ndarray, idx_categorical_static:Optional[List[T]]=None, groups:Optional[Dict[str, array]]=None)

Args: S (pd.DataFrame): Array of static features of shape (n_time_series, n_features). X (pd.DataFrame): Array of exogenous variables of shape (n_time_series, n_exogenous, n_periods). Y (pd.DataFrame): Array of target variable of shape (n_time_series, n_periods). idx_categorical_static (list, optional): List of categorical indexes of S. groups (dict, optional): Dictionary of groups. Example: {'Yearly': ['Y1', 'Y2']}

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Información meta de Turismo

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class Tourism[source]

Tourism(S:ndarray, X:ndarray, Y:ndarray, idx_categorical_static:Optional[List[T]]=None, groups:Optional[Dict[str, array]]=None) :: TimeSeriesDataset

Args: S (pd.DataFrame): Array of static features of shape (n_time_series, n_features). X (pd.DataFrame): Array of exogenous variables of shape (n_time_series, n_exogenous, n_periods). Y (pd.DataFrame): Array of target variable of shape (n_time_series, n_periods). idx_categorical_static (list, optional): List of categorical indexes of S. groups (dict, optional): Dictionary of groups. Example: {'Yearly': ['Y1', 'Y2']}

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
tourism_dataset = Tourism.load('data')

100%|██████████| 356k/356k [00:00<00:00, 1.46MiB/s]
INFO:__main__:Successfully downloaded 27-3-Athanasopoulos1.zip, 356334, bytes.
INFO:__main__:Successfully decompressed data/tourism/datasets/27-3-Athanasopoulos1.zip
{% endraw %}

Si se necesita un grupo en particular se usa el método get_group.

{% raw %} 
tourism_dataset_yearly = tourism_dataset.get_group('Yearly')
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
